mapper.select: SELECT WI_RQCODE AS SCCODE, WI_HELPER AS SCHELPER, RQ_MMID AS SCWISHER, MG_FILTERNAME AS SCFILTERNAME, SG_SUBNAME AS SCSUBNAME, RQ_TITLE AS SDTITLE FROM WI INNER JOIN RQ ON WI.WI_RQCODE = RQ.RQ_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN MG ON MG.MG_FILTERCODE = RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SG ON SG.SG_SUBCODE =RQ.RQ_SUBCODE WHERE RQ_CODE='5000210309040337'

SELECT SD_SCWIRQCODE AS SCCODE, SD_SCWIBIHELPER AS SCHELPER, RQ_MMID AS SCWISHER, MG_FILTERNAME AS SCFILTERNAME, SG_SUBNAME AS SCSUBNAME, RQ_TITLE AS SDTITLE, SD_STEP AS SCSTEP, SD_PERIOD AS SDDATE, SD_COMMENT AS SDCOMMENT, SC_STCODE AS SCSTATUS FROM SD INNER JOIN RQ ON SD.SD_SCWIRQCODE = RQ.RQ_CODE INNER JOIN SC ON SC.SC_WIRQCODE = RQ.RQ_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN MG ON MG.MG_FILTERCODE = RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SG ON SG.SG_SUBCODE =RQ.RQ_SUBCODE WHERE RQ_CODE='5000210309040337'
